entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Colborne 08:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: SW 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning. Local snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
